BILLING_EVENTS.description: Raw billing events data from source systems

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each billing event

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Identifier linking to the user who generated the billing event

columns.name: EVENT_TYPE
columns.business_description: Type of billing event (subscription, usage, etc.)

columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.business_description: Monetary amount associated with the billing event

columns.name: EVENT_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the billing event occurred

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system that provided the billing event data

FEATURE_USAGE.description: Raw feature usage data tracking user interactions

columns.name: USAGE_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each feature usage record

columns.name: MEETING_ID
columns.business_description: Identifier linking to the meeting where feature was used

columns.name: FEATURE_NAME
columns.business_description: Name of the feature that was used

columns.name: USAGE_COUNT
columns.business_description: Number of times the feature was used in the session

columns.name: USAGE_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the feature usage occurred

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system that provided the feature usage data

LICENSES.description: Raw license assignment and management data

columns.name: LICENSE_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each license

columns.name: LICENSE_TYPE
columns.business_description: Type of license (Basic, Pro, Business, Enterprise)

columns.name: ASSIGNED_TO_USER_ID
columns.business_description: User ID to whom the license is assigned

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the license becomes active

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the license expires

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system that provided the license data

MEETINGS.description: Raw meeting data including scheduling and basic meeting information

columns.name: MEETING_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each meeting

columns.name: HOST_ID
columns.business_description: User ID of the meeting host

columns.name: MEETING_TOPIC
columns.business_description: Topic or title of the meeting

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the meeting started

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the meeting ended

columns.name: DURATION_MINUTES
columns.business_description: Duration of the meeting in minutes

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system that provided the meeting data

PARTICIPANTS.description: Raw participant data tracking meeting attendance

columns.name: PARTICIPANT_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each participant session

columns.name: MEETING_ID
columns.business_description: Identifier linking to the meeting

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Identifier of the user who participated

columns.name: JOIN_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the participant joined the meeting

columns.name: LEAVE_TIME
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the participant left the meeting

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system that provided the participant data

SUPPORT_TICKETS.description: Raw support ticket data from customer service systems

columns.name: TICKET_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each support ticket

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Identifier of the user who created the support ticket

columns.name: TICKET_TYPE
columns.business_description: Category of the support ticket

columns.name: RESOLUTION_STATUS
columns.business_description: Current status of the ticket resolution

columns.name: OPEN_DATE
columns.business_description: Date when the support ticket was opened

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system that provided the support ticket data

USERS.description: Raw user account data from user management systems

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.business_description: Unique identifier for each user account

columns.name: USER_NAME
columns.business_description: Display name of the user

columns.name: EMAIL
columns.business_description: Email address of the user

columns.name: COMPANY
columns.business_description: Company or organization the user belongs to

columns.name: PLAN_TYPE
columns.business_description: Subscription plan type for the user

columns.name: LOAD_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer

columns.name: UPDATE_TIMESTAMP
columns.business_description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

columns.name: SOURCE_SYSTEM
columns.business_description: Source system that provided the user data

markdown_documentation.BILLING_EVENTS:
# BILLING_EVENTS

| Column Name | Business Description | Data Type | Constraints | Domain Values |
|-------------|---------------------|-----------|-------------|---------------|
| EVENT_ID | Unique identifier for each billing event | VARCHAR(16777216) | Primary Key, Not Null | N/A |
| USER_ID | Identifier linking to the user who generated the billing event | VARCHAR(16777216) | Foreign Key, Not Null | N/A |
| EVENT_TYPE | Type of billing event (subscription, usage, etc.) | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | subscription, usage, refund, adjustment |
| AMOUNT | Monetary amount associated with the billing event | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | N/A |
| EVENT_DATE | Date when the billing event occurred | DATE | Not Null | N/A |
| LOAD_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Not Null | N/A |
| UPDATE_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was last updated | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Nullable | N/A |
| SOURCE_SYSTEM | Source system that provided the billing event data | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | billing_system, payment_gateway, subscription_service |
markdown_documentation.FEATURE_USAGE:
# FEATURE_USAGE

| Column Name | Business Description | Data Type | Constraints | Domain Values |
|-------------|---------------------|-----------|-------------|---------------|
| USAGE_ID | Unique identifier for each feature usage record | VARCHAR(16777216) | Primary Key, Not Null | N/A |
| MEETING_ID | Identifier linking to the meeting where feature was used | VARCHAR(16777216) | Foreign Key, Not Null | N/A |
| FEATURE_NAME | Name of the feature that was used | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | screen_share, recording, chat, breakout_rooms, whiteboard |
| USAGE_COUNT | Number of times the feature was used in the session | NUMBER(38,0) | Not Null, >= 0 | N/A |
| USAGE_DATE | Date when the feature usage occurred | DATE | Not Null | N/A |
| LOAD_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Not Null | N/A |
| UPDATE_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was last updated | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Nullable | N/A |
| SOURCE_SYSTEM | Source system that provided the feature usage data | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | zoom_client, web_portal, mobile_app |
markdown_documentation.LICENSES:
# LICENSES

| Column Name | Business Description | Data Type | Constraints | Domain Values |
|-------------|---------------------|-----------|-------------|---------------|
| LICENSE_ID | Unique identifier for each license | VARCHAR(16777216) | Primary Key, Not Null | N/A |
| LICENSE_TYPE | Type of license (Basic, Pro, Business, Enterprise) | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | Basic, Pro, Business, Enterprise |
| ASSIGNED_TO_USER_ID | User ID to whom the license is assigned | VARCHAR(16777216) | Foreign Key, Nullable | N/A |
| START_DATE | Date when the license becomes active | DATE | Not Null | N/A |
| END_DATE | Date when the license expires | VARCHAR(16777216) | Nullable | N/A |
| LOAD_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Not Null | N/A |
| UPDATE_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was last updated | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Nullable | N/A |
| SOURCE_SYSTEM | Source system that provided the license data | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | license_management, admin_portal, billing_system |
markdown_documentation.MEETINGS:
# MEETINGS

| Column Name | Business Description | Data Type | Constraints | Domain Values |
|-------------|---------------------|-----------|-------------|---------------|
| MEETING_ID | Unique identifier for each meeting | VARCHAR(16777216) | Primary Key, Not Null | N/A |
| HOST_ID | User ID of the meeting host | VARCHAR(16777216) | Foreign Key, Not Null | N/A |
| MEETING_TOPIC | Topic or title of the meeting | VARCHAR(16777216) | Nullable | N/A |
| START_TIME | Timestamp when the meeting started | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Not Null | N/A |
| END_TIME | Timestamp when the meeting ended | VARCHAR(16777216) | Nullable | N/A |
| DURATION_MINUTES | Duration of the meeting in minutes | VARCHAR(16777216) | Nullable, >= 0 | N/A |
| LOAD_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Not Null | N/A |
| UPDATE_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was last updated | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Nullable | N/A |
| SOURCE_SYSTEM | Source system that provided the meeting data | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | zoom_api, meeting_scheduler, calendar_integration |
markdown_documentation.PARTICIPANTS:
# PARTICIPANTS

| Column Name | Business Description | Data Type | Constraints | Domain Values |
|-------------|---------------------|-----------|-------------|---------------|
| PARTICIPANT_ID | Unique identifier for each participant session | VARCHAR(16777216) | Primary Key, Not Null | N/A |
| MEETING_ID | Identifier linking to the meeting | VARCHAR(16777216) | Foreign Key, Not Null | N/A |
| USER_ID | Identifier of the user who participated | VARCHAR(16777216) | Foreign Key, Not Null | N/A |
| JOIN_TIME | Timestamp when the participant joined the meeting | VARCHAR(16777216) | Nullable | N/A |
| LEAVE_TIME | Timestamp when the participant left the meeting | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Nullable | N/A |
| LOAD_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Not Null | N/A |
| UPDATE_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was last updated | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Nullable | N/A |
| SOURCE_SYSTEM | Source system that provided the participant data | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | zoom_api, meeting_logs, attendance_tracker |
markdown_documentation.SUPPORT_TICKETS:
# SUPPORT_TICKETS

| Column Name | Business Description | Data Type | Constraints | Domain Values |
|-------------|---------------------|-----------|-------------|---------------|
| TICKET_ID | Unique identifier for each support ticket | VARCHAR(16777216) | Primary Key, Not Null | N/A |
| USER_ID | Identifier of the user who created the support ticket | VARCHAR(16777216) | Foreign Key, Not Null | N/A |
| TICKET_TYPE | Category of the support ticket | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | technical, billing, account, feature_request |
| RESOLUTION_STATUS | Current status of the ticket resolution | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | open, in_progress, resolved, closed |
| OPEN_DATE | Date when the support ticket was opened | DATE | Not Null | N/A |
| LOAD_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Not Null | N/A |
| UPDATE_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was last updated | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Nullable | N/A |
| SOURCE_SYSTEM | Source system that provided the support ticket data | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | zendesk, salesforce, support_portal |
markdown_documentation.USERS:
# USERS

| Column Name | Business Description | Data Type | Constraints | Domain Values |
|-------------|---------------------|-----------|-------------|---------------|
| USER_ID | Unique identifier for each user account | VARCHAR(16777216) | Primary Key, Not Null | N/A |
| USER_NAME | Display name of the user | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | N/A |
| EMAIL | Email address of the user | VARCHAR(16777216) | Unique, Not Null | N/A |
| COMPANY | Company or organization the user belongs to | VARCHAR(16777216) | Nullable | N/A |
| PLAN_TYPE | Subscription plan type for the user | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | Basic, Pro, Business, Enterprise |
| LOAD_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was loaded into the raw layer | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Not Null | N/A |
| UPDATE_TIMESTAMP | Timestamp when the record was last updated | TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) | Nullable | N/A |
| SOURCE_SYSTEM | Source system that provided the user data | VARCHAR(16777216) | Not Null | user_management, ldap, sso_provider |
